Summary: It looked like another planet in the night sky, similar to Jupiter.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in White Rock
There were no other sightings in White Rock on or around September 18th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsAt first we (my wife and I) thought is was another planet as Jupiter is in the eastern night sky at the time. This "apparent" planet appeared as a bright light for a few minutes then it suddenly moved in a very direct and straight line eastward until is was gone.
